Title: Relates to establishing a personal income tax credit for the purchase of reusable shopping bags; authorizes and directs the department of environmental conservation to study the use of reusable shopping bags
Summary: Establishes a personal income tax credit for the purchase of reusable shopping bags; authorizes and directs the department of environmental conservation to study the impact of using reusable shopping bags on the environment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a personal income tax credit for the purchase of reusable shopping bags; and to authorize and direct the department of environmental conservation to study the impact of using reusable shopping bags
